name: Scoundrel's Luck
Lore: '''You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake, well, this could be it, sweetheart.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Infiltration with three [Scoundrel] cards from Reserve Deck face down under here. Once during your turn, at any time, may deploy a [Scoundrel] Effect from here. If a [Scoundrel] Effect just left table, stack it under here. At the start of your turn, stack all [Scoundrel] Effects under here. Once per turn, may place any card in Lost Pile out of play to deploy a character weapon (except a grenade) from Lost Pile. While two non-droid scoundrels present at battlegrounds, Their Fire Has Gone Out Of The Universe flips and may not flip back. (Immune to Alter.)',
